humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions three separate nodules of invasive ductal carcinoma, the largest of which measures 3.7 cm. This exceeds the 5 cm cutoff for T2 tumors, making the T stage T3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report describes three separate nodules in the right breast, with the largest one measuring 3.7 cm. The T stage for breast cancer is based on the size of the largest tumor, and in this case, it is greater than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm, which corresponds to T2 stage.
